phrases.menuFadeMaterialHint: The material to make your fading door turn into when faded.
phrases.friendsAddInputString: Enter the SteamID64 of the friend you want to add:
phrases.toolgunPlaceKeypad: Place the keypad where you are looking
phrases.toolgunSelectFadingDoor: Select a prop to turn into a fading door
phrases.friendsMenuTopHint:
The friends you set here will be able to use the fingerprint scanner on your keypads.
These will save across different servers and restarts.
phrases.checkerHint:
Left Click on a keypad to see info about it and it's connected fading door.
Right Click to deselect.
phrases.crackerDescription: Click on a keypad a wait to crack it
phrases.menuFadeTimeHint: The time to keep your fading door open.
phrases.checkerDescription: Click on a keypad to see info about it and it's connected fading door.
phrases.keypadReachedPersonalLimit: You've reached your personal sKeypad limit!
phrases.friendsTooMany: You have too many friends, truncating!
phrases.toolgunDescription: Spawn and set up your own keypad
phrases.menuSecureModeHint: Hides the password when you type it.
